channel.title: Posts on Data Privacy Memo
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Data Privacy Memo

item.title: Privacy Tool Spotlight: EFF's Cover Your Tracks
item.description: This free tool from the Electronic Frontier Foundation reveals your digital fingerprint, showing exactly how trackable you are online and empowering you with practical strategies to protect your privacy.

item.title: Five Surprising Ways Data Privacy Impacts Real Life
item.description: From algorithmic job screening to hidden healthcare data ecosystems, these real-world scenarios transform abstract GDPR concepts into urgent human stories that affect our daily lives.

item.title: From Consumer Finance to Data Privacy
item.description: My seventeen-year journey from untangling predatory lending to exploring data privacy law revealed a crucial insight: data isn't just numbers, but the story of people's lives, their struggles, and their vulnerabilities.
